title: Trump Files a Lawsuit Against New York’s Attorney General
description: The case, filed in Florida, seeks to stop Letitia James’s lawsuit in New York and includes Mr. Trump’s signature rhetoric. His legal advisers are split on the wisdom of filing it.
dc:creator: Jonah E. Bromwich, Maggie Haberman, Ben Protess and William K. Rashbaum
media:credit: Brittany Greeson for The New York Times
media:description: The Florida suit includes boasts about the former president’s business and insults directed at his opponents.
